name: OhFarm
author: peigeng jiang
title: OhFarm Application Project
subtitle: An application that provides thorough information about kitchen farming
body: This application is designed to provide information about kitchen farming. The application contains hundreds of plants that are suitable for growing inside household. Additionally, it provides tracking system to alart user when to water and harvest. For those people whom has limited space inside their household, this application also provide map with community garden around users.

name: DUUET Website
author: peigeng jiang
title: DUUET Website Redesign
subtitle: DUUET website reflect on current design trend and align with it's company startegy
body: DUUET is a Melbourne based wedding photography and videography studio. This project redesigned company's website to align with current design trend and company's vision. By researching target audiences of the company and it's business strategy, we quickly settled design style, color secheme and layout. The new design result in 50% increase in vist rate the following month after publishing.

name: Lighthaus Website
author: peigeng jiang
title: Lighthaus Website Design
subtitle: Web visual design for Lighthaus wedding videography company
body: Web visual design for Lighthaus wedding videography company

name: FanFou Website
author: peigeng jiang
title: FanFou Website Design
subtitle: Web design for Sichuan food restaurant
body: Web design for Sichuan food restaurant. Using red color and pattern as the base of the design to represent hot and spicy flavor in Sichuan food. Bright color and traditional Chinese pattern have also been used as iconic Chinese design elements.

name: DesTech project
author: peigeng jiang
title: DesTech project
subtitle: An Event Rebranding project with DesTech, International Conference on design & technology
body: An Event Rebranding project with DesTech, International Conference on design & technology. This 6 month project established by four member team and assisted by DesTech designer.

name: Backery project
author: peigeng jiang
title: Backery project
subtitle: An pincky backery project
body: The project created a whole brand to backery store Pinky bakery. The design range from brand, cards, logo to packages and website. The design is focus on fitting the style of current backery store.

name: Me book design
author: peigeng jiang
title: Me book design
subtitle: A whole book design about self journey.
body: A whole book design that tells about personal journey. The whole book page using paper cutting technique to present the shapes and ideas.

name: Cooking book
author: peigeng jiang
title: Cooking book
subtitle: Cover and layout design for cooking books
body: The cooking book cover and inner pages design consisted using simple drawing and lines to convey the idea.
